Name: Hanefield Asylum
About the game: Hanefield Asylum is an Indie Devloped Horror game. Welcome to Hanefield, the Town situated at the heart of Hane Valley. Hanefield is a wonderfully presented town covered in acres of green, where residents from all over the country come to live amongst the wildlife. Hanefield however is mostly known for it's Asylum, the one place most residents avoid due to it's history. At Hanefield, you play a young gentleman who's name is not known and who's identity is lost. It is your mission to escape the Asylum, and try to discover your identity along the way. Armed with light and a gun, you must fight your way to the end only to relive the moments over and over. Follow the story, explore the asylum and keep your mentality sane for as long as you can! This game requires Keyboard & Mouse to play, standard WSAD for movement, mouse to look around and shoot. Please see the Controls menu inside the game to see other keybinds, please note these cannot be changed.
